Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Venice (Dorsoduro), Hotel Tiziano is minutes from Maritime Station and Church of San Sebastiano. This family-friendly hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 14 air-conditioned guestrooms. Private bathrooms with showers feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes, and cribs/infant beds can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and multilingual staff.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2:30 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Located in Venice (Dorsoduro), Hotel Tiziano is minutes from Maritime Station and Church of San Sebastiano. This family-friendly hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Maritime Station - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Church of San Sebastiano - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Zenobio Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Campo Santa Margherita - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Piazzale Roma - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Tolentini - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Ca' Rezzonico - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Papadopoli Gardens - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Squero di San Trovaso - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Ca' Foscari University of Venice - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Palazzo Foscari - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Ca' Rezzonico Gallery - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Church of St. Roch - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Confraternity of St. Roch - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Scuola Grande di San Giovanni Evangelista - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Tiziano is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Tiziano is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 8.2 km / 5.1 mi.
